ServicesPage.title: Services
ServicesPage.subtitle: AI-driven Drug Discovery Platform, ADC Platform

intro.title: What is ADC Platform?
intro.desc: ADC Platform is an AI-based Drug Discovery platform that connects target discovery → candidate design → evidence verification → prioritization into a single workflow during the ADC R&D process. It automatically collects and organizes distributed information such as papers, patents, public DBs, and internal data, provides evidence-based answers to researcher questions, and supports quantitative comparison of candidate combinations.

problems.title: Problems We Solve
items: Difficult to compare target/antibody/linker/payload candidates due to scattered data.
Excessive time spent finding and organizing evidence slows down experimental design.
ADC design involves many variables, making decision-making prone to experience bias.
Distributed document/result management reduces reproducibility and collaboration efficiency.

items.title: Reduce Research Time
items.desc: Automate search, organization, and reporting to shorten research lead time.

items.title: Evidence-First
items.desc: Answers and recommendations are always provided with sources/evidence for easy verification.

items.title: Design-to-Decision
items.desc: Connects design generation to comparison, scoring, and prioritization.

items.title: Organizational Collaboration
items.desc: Standardize research collaboration based on projects, permissions, and audit logs.

flow.title: Workflow
items: Target/Indication Definition: Input cancer type, biomarker, mechanism hypothesis
Data Collection & Organization: Auto-collection + knowledge processing of papers/patents/DBs
Candidate Design: Generate antibody/linker/payload combinations and organize candidates
Evidence-based Verification: Check evidence sentences/papers/patents via RAG Q&A
Scoring/Prioritization: Quantitative comparison of success probability, risk, and developability
Report/Share: Auto-generate results for investment, internal review, and experimental planning

items.title: Hybrid Search
items.desc: Keyword + Semantic search to capture important keywords and context.

items.title: Explainable Recommendation
items.desc: Provides reasons why a candidate is favorable along with evidence.

items.title: Modular Expansion
items.desc: Expand data connectors, models, and scoring rules to fit organizational needs.

items.title: Enterprise Operations
items.desc: Provides an operational structure considering permissions, security, audit, and deployment options.

data.title: Data Collection & Knowledge Processing
items: External Data Connectors: PubMed/NCBI papers, patents, public DB integration
Internal Data Integration: Upload research notes, PDFs, spreadsheets with metadata normalization
Knowledge Pipeline: Document structure analysis, chunking, embedding, indexing

search.title: Hybrid Search & RAG Q&A
items: Keyword Search (BM25) + Semantic Search (Vector) Combination
Evidence-based Answers (RAG): Provide evidence sentences/sources used in answers

design.title: ADC Design Support
items: Design Element Management: Structure key parameters like Target, Antibody, Linker, Payload, DAR
Candidate Comparison: List up candidates, tagging, notes, comments, status management

scoring.title: Scoring & Risk Assessment
items: Quantitative Comparison: Target suitability, linker stability, payload toxicity, etc.
Explainable Scoring: Provide evidence and contributing factors for scores

collab.title: Collaboration & Operations
items: Project/Workspace: Team/Task separation
Permissions/Security: RBAC, Audit Logs
Report Generation: Auto-generate summary reports, PDF export

SolutionsPage.title: Solutions
SolutionsPage.subtitle: Tailored Solutions for Each Research Stage

target.title: Target Intelligence
target.desc: Derive promising target candidates based on cancer type/indication and structure evidence to judge value.
target.example: New target discovery, competitive pipeline research, indication expansion review

optimization.title: ADC Design Optimization
optimization.desc: Systematically organize antibody/linker/payload combinations and identify risk points early.
optimization.example: Linker stability comparison, payload selection evidence, candidate down-selection

risk.title: Developability & Safety Risk Check
risk.desc: Check development risks and present safety concerns with evidence to reduce failure costs.

knowledge.title: Organizational Knowledge Ops
knowledge.desc: Collect and organize scattered data into organizational knowledge assets.
knowledge.example: New hire onboarding, task handover, internal standard report templates

deployment.title: Deployment Options
items: MVP (Fast Adoption): Core Connectors + Search/RAG + Basic Workspace
Team Expansion: Scoring/Report Automation/Collaboration Features
Enterprise: SSO, Audit Logs, Dedicated Deployment (VPC/On-prem), SLA
